class.name: UtilityAIBTRepeater
class.brief_description: Repeats its child node for [member max_repeat_times] number of times before returning [code]SUCCESS[/code].
class.description:
The Repeater node repeats its child node for [member max_repeat_times] number of successes before returning [code]SUCCESS[/code] until which point it returns [code]RUNNING[/code]. If the child returns [code]FAILURE[/code] this node immediately returns [code]FAILURE[/code].
If [member max_repeat_times] is set to [code]-1[/code] the child will be ticked indefinitely.

method.name: get_times_repeated
method.description: Returns the number of times this node has repeated.

members.member: The maximum times the limiter node can be ticked. [code]-1[/code] for to repeat indefinitely.
